Articles.Content:
Hello guys, good morning ( Night or day ), my name is Gabriel B., and i am trying to make a mod. Well with the mod i would like to bring a better visual to the game for these
peope who can't run a graphic mod, but an important thing is that i doesn't want, to quote the originality of the base game, so the kerbals aren't modified, the mod doesn't add any sound or different effects for the game, the textures were made without killing the original appearance of the planets, so the mod preserves the originallity of  KSP, and bring a major experience for you all, it's name is going to be Enceladus, and, this mod is being made with a group of other light mods that together make the game drastically more beautiful and realistic than the base game, but without taking the originality of the game how i sad before, but i am is with two problems : 

1- I can't apply any texture to eve, because of it's normal map, when i apply something it gets strange how you can see in the first image down below, and it is because of it's normal map, and when i try to replace the normal map, the light gets really really bizzare as you can see on image 2, 3 and 4 well, i am don't know a lot about programming, so i really really is needing someone to auxiliar me in that

 Image I > https://ibb.co/Ct6XVYm

Image II >  https://ibb.co/mBzfdm3

Image III > https://ibb.co/NZQMsRv

Image IIII > https://ibb.co/pn0Kf4Z

2 - And i would like to add an beautiful atmosphere in Jool like, i made in this photo on photoshop, i have the comparison between how it is actually in the game ( Image I ) and how i would like to be ( Image 2 ) just i bit little less.

Image I > https://ibb.co/jwDpnRy

Image II > https://ibb.co/99ckB09

So guys is this, if you can help me, i will be really grateful for you all ! Plis help me <3

Edited September 9, 2019 by Gabriel B
I would like to make the links acessable ( I added links on the tool )
You don't need to create a mod, just learn how to make configs for Kopernicus, Scatterer, and EVE.
